meta.title: Bills - TrustPay
meta.description: Submit and track bill payments with approvals and status visibility.

page.title: Bills & Payments
page.subtitle: Submit bill payments with clear approval states and audit-friendly details.
page.statusLegendBody: Submitted ≠ paid. Pending payments stay in review until an admin posts the debit. Your available balance is not reduced until posting or a backend hold is applied.

list.title: Recent bill payments
list.subtitle: View submitted, approved, rejected, or failed payments.
list.empty: No bill payments yet. Submit your first bill on the right to see it here.
list.audit1: Status chips show if a payment is pending approval, paid, rejected, or failed.
list.audit2: Click any bill to view reference numbers, review timestamps, and rejection reasons.
list.audit3: Refreshing pulls the latest state from the backend—no client-side balance edits.

steps.selectCategorySubtitle: Choose the bill type to load the right billers and review requirements.
steps.selectBillerSubtitle: Pick a listed biller or add the name exactly as it appears on your bill.
steps.noBillers: No billers are listed for this category yet. You can enter a custom biller name.
steps.customBillerInfo: If you enter a custom biller, we will use that name for this payment only.
steps.referencePlaceholder: Enter the reference number shown on your bill
steps.notePlaceholder: Add a note for this payment
steps.detailsIntroBody: Use the reference/account number printed on your bill. Pending payments do not reduce available balance until approved.
steps.paymentDescriptionPlaceholder: Visible to you and admins for audit (e.g., "July rent, unit 12B").
steps.adminApprovalBody: Submitted ≠ paid. Admins review and post the debit before funds leave your account. Pending items do not reduce available balance unless a backend hold is applied.

statusHelp.SUBMITTED: Waiting for admin approval. Funds may stay in available balance until posted.
statusHelp.PAID: Posted to your account and settled to the biller.
statusHelp.REJECTED: Not processed. Any holds are released.
statusHelp.FAILED: Attempted but failed. Review and resubmit.

review.noticeBody: Payments remain pending until an admin approves and posts the ledger entry. You will see the status update below once processed.
